title: Jiffi Stop - egyptian-ish slab serif, custom?
content:
i felt silly when asked to ID this, but it just doesn't match up to very much as far as i've found. The hook on the J could be custom, but the whole logo/type is handled so generically that i didn't believe that.

Name: "Jiffi Stop"

-hook on the uppercase J (maybe custom)  
-short tops on the lowercase f  
-inside of uppercase O not perfectly circular  
-uppercase T elements totally vertical (before skew/ital)

any ideas? (Thanks in advance!)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202111215im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jiffi_4045.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202111215im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jiffi2_3482.jpg)

(this just smacks of something pretty obvious to you pros, but im in the dark :\)
author: Jeff Peppers

comments.content:
also:  
there are a handful of "similar, but not it" fonts on myfonts.com  
beton - [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/beton-sh/xbold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202111215/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/beton-sh/xbold/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/beton-sh/xbold/")  
hunter - [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/aboutype/hunter/black/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202111215/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/aboutype/hunter/black/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/aboutype/hunter/black/")

I'm thinking it's probably a font, rather than a completely custom job. A custom job would never have passed up on the opportunity for an FFI ligature! It is likely, however, that the letters got a few tweaks along the logo design path.

Beton is very close. [Geometric Slabserif 712 from Bitstream](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202111215/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/families/geometric_slabserif_712_extra_bold/) is another close one, but I have yet to find an oblique.

If you'll indulge the diversion, here are a few products that didn't pass up the chance to class up their act by sneaking in a 3-letter ligature.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202111215im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jiffylube_5466.gif)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202111215im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Jiffy_Pop_3577.jpg)
